alert.note: Alert for McLeod; Meeker; Renville (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 12:44AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Meeker, northwestern Sibley, McLeod and northeastern Renville Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1243 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brownton, or 11 miles south of Hutchinson, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Arlington around 100 AM CDT. This includes U.S. Highway 212 between mile markers 88 and 126. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for central and east central Minnesota.
